testcaseName: Dose # 3 at 4 years-4 days but not six months after dose 2.  Child will need another.
forecastTestType: Recommended based on minimum interval from previous dose (catch-up)
generalDescription: This test case describes when a child is administered a third of the Polio vaccine at 4 years - 4 days but less than the six month interval from the second dose that the doses are valid.  Another dose should be forecast.
reasonForChange: Rolled birth date forward to 2011 to ensure test was relevant to when ACIP recommendations were made.  Previous dates were before the ACIP recommendations were published.
